nodes.text: The Fortune was a starship that served as a mobile headquarters for the Zendiat Collective, a thieving guild led by the human treasure hunter Zool Zendiat. Because one of its passengers, the Patrolian Kanna, belonged to an aquatic species, the Fortune notably housed a water tank.
The Fortune greatly resembles the Dynamic-class freighter, which first appeared in the Legends video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.
